alert.note: Alert for Panola (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 09 at 5:14AM CST until January 09 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Patchy visibilities of one quarter to one half mile in freezing fog, especially near bodies of water. * WHERE...Panola County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and potential frost on bridges. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks causing slippery roads. &&Visibility 3 to 4 miles in freezing fog.
